mapper.insert: insert into dd_notice (not_num, not_title, not_writer, not_content, not_date) values('NT00' || not_seq.nextval, #{not_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{not_writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{not_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from dd_notice where not_num = #{not_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
